text: Creates work items that cook an embedded Composite ROP node
This node is a subnet that contains a

TOP node and
a ROP Network with a

ROP node. The parameters on the
Composite node are promoted onto this node’s interface. Relevant parameters from
the ROP Fetch are also available.

The subnet also contains a built in COP network. By default the ROP Composite
is configured to use that COP network. When the

option
is enabled the ROP Composite can instead be used with any COP network in the
.hip file.
example shows how you can use this node to overlay text on top of rendered images.
